name: Portrait of hope #010
description:
It is part of the project "Mosaic of Hope"

I created 540 black and white portraits of people wearing protective masks with messages of hope and wishes for the future, gathered in a monumental open-air work: a large mosaic in the heart of Strasbourg...

This is the challenge I set myself when I left the containment on may 2020.

Prints measuring 1m by 1m, stuck to the ground with a distance of 1m between each portrait in order to symbolically respect the physical distance.

In this way, we will also carry the message that culture remains possible, necessary and beneficial... and we will carry this message together.

More about the project at [Fr] : https://www.christophdebarry.fr/mosaique-de-lespoir/
